course_description: Economic analysis of property rights, contracts, torts, and other aspects of the legal system. Legal rules will be viewed as mechanisms for allocating resources, and the efficiency of alternative legal rules is analyzed.
prerequisites: This course requires ECON 201 OR ECON_OX201 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2540, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: S. Mialon, Status: Open
